name: srabase
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: sralem(cbs, c0, c1, c2, nat1, w0)
stmt.pretty: sralem(cbs, c0, c1, c2, nat1, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(nat1))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)
-| wo(wbr(nat1, clt, nat5), wbr(nat8, clt, nat1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(nat1))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)
-| wo(wbr(nat1, clt, nat5), wbr(nat8, clt, nat1))

|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)
-| wo(wbr(nat1, clt, nat5), wbr(nat8, clt, nat1))

|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
-| wo(wbr(nat1, clt, nat5), wbr(nat8, clt, nat1))

stmt.origin: orci(wbr(nat1, clt, nat5), wbr(nat8, clt, nat1))

body.origin:
|- wo(wbr(nat1, clt, nat5), wbr(nat8, clt, nat1))
-| wbr(nat1, clt, nat5)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
-| wbr(nat1, clt, nat5)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 =((subringAlg ` c0)` c2))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆(Base ` c0))
⊣ 1[<]5

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(csra, c0), c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 =((subringAlg ` c0)` c2))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆(Base ` c0))

comment: Base set of a subring algebra. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Nov-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
